parameters.name: ContainerGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the elastic container instance on which the CommitContainer task is executed.\
You must enter the instance ID, the task ID, or both for the request.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.\
Maximum value: 50.\
Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that determines the start point of the query. Set the value to the value of NextToken that is returned from the last request.

parameters.name: TaskStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the task. Valid values:

*   Running
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
